This guide is a simplified overview of all the changes in the {{JE}} [[Java Edition Beta 1.7|Beta 1.7]].x releases, which assumes at least some familiarity with Beta 1.6.x releases.

== Mobs ==
=== Changed ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|Changed Mobs}}
|-
|[[Sheep]]
|{{Animate|White Sheep JE1.png;Sheared White Sheep JE1.png|128px}}
|
* No longer drop [[wool]] when punched.
* Can now be sheared.
|}
